short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a link to the Utah Real Estate listing for applicable Zillow listings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes life easier for those shopping for homes in Utah. Zillow pulls a lot of its listings from UtahRealEstate.com. Sometimes to find the best images and up-to-date information, you have to track down the MLS number and search the property on Utah Real Estate. This extension does the work for you, identifying the homes that come from Utah Real Estate's site and creating a link on the top of the listing.
